meanings.sent1: She uplighted the stage for the performance.
meanings.sent2: The event planner decided to uplight the room to create a dramatic effect.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat uplighted the room by shining a flashlight under the table.
meanings.sent4: Her smile uplighted the entire room, making everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise uplighting the mountains was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The act of shining light upwards.
meanings.sent1: The uplighting of the building made it look majestic at night.
meanings.sent2: The wedding venue had beautiful uplighting to enhance the ambiance.
meanings.sent3: The uplighting in the haunted house made the ghosts look even scarier.
meanings.sent4: The uplighting of the trees in the park created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The uplighting of the stage highlighted the performers perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The uplighting in the garden illuminated the flowers beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The event decorator used uplighting to create a warm and inviting space.
meanings.sent3: The uplighting in the art gallery made the paintings look like they were glowing.
meanings.sent4: The uplighting of the statue gave it a majestic appearance.
meanings.sent5: The uplighting of the fountain created a mesmerizing effect in the park.
